headline: Raymond James Announces Full Redemption of its Series B Preferred Stock and Related Depositary Shares
summary: St. Petersburg, Fla., Dec. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On December 2, 2025, Raymond James Financial, Inc. (NYSE: RJF) announced that, on January 2, 2026, it will redeem all 80,500 outstanding shares of its 6.375% Fixed-to-Floating Rate Series B Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, par value $0.10 per share (the “Series B Preferred Stock”). The redemption of the Series B Preferred Stock will trigger the redemption of the related depositary shares, each representing a 1/40th interest of a sh
